name: Brain Games (itch)
description:
A game I made as the final project for a game design class.

Recommended: Full Screen

The story takes you, as the main character of the story, through certain situations, where you will have to make decisions. Do not be afraid to go through your decisions and try again. You might learn something new.

How to play:

Click on the option (in red) that you desire, to get you through the story.

If the option is blue-purple, you have taken that path before.

Good luck.

Note: A big thank you to Yadu for help with the game.

Feedback is welcome!
